description: Defines the repository interface for notes persistence operations in the NotesBackend project.

methods.name: GetByUser
methods.description: Retrieves all notes associated with a specific user.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by user ID and note ID.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a new note to the repository.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a specific note by user ID and note ID.
